implements java.io.Serializable

      • calculate

        public abstract double calculate(double x)
        参数:
        x - the input value
        返回:
        the function value of x

      • derivativeByX

        public abstract double derivativeByX(double x)
        参数:
        x - the input value
        返回:
        the function's derivative value of x

      • derivativeByY

        public abstract double derivativeByY(double y)
        参数:
        y - the function value calculated by the method calculate
        返回:
        the function's derivative value of function value y
